thread.title: Overtime pay in HSE hits €639k a day as hospitals deal with chronic staff shortages
thread.title_full: Overtime pay in HSE hits €639k a day as hospitals deal with chronic staff shortages

title: Overtime pay in HSE hits €639k a day as hospitals deal with chronic staff shortages
text: Overtime pay in HSE hits €639k a day as hospitals deal with chronic staff shortages Independent.ie A doctor earned €123,000 in extra pay last year as a chronic staff shortage pushed the health service overtime bill to €639,269 a day. Extra hours worked by a range of staff cost €175m in the first nine months of 2016, new figures secured by the Sunday Independent reveal. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/health/overtime-pay-in-hse-hits-639k-a-day-as-hospitals-deal-with-chronic-staff-shortages-35443558.html http://www.independent.ie/world-news/article35443471.ece/a5f5f/AUTOCROP/h342/PANews_P-efba95f0-1ad9-4eae-b4fa-6f67e0c9d704_I1.jpg Brian Turner, a health economist attached to University College Cork, described the individual overtime payments as "mind-boggling" (Stock picture) A doctor earned €123,000 in extra pay last year as a chronic staff shortage pushed the health service overtime bill to €639,269 a day. Extra hours worked by a range of staff cost €175m in the first nine months of 2016, new figures secured by the Sunday Independent reveal.
